messages.message: Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Hello czar :) I think we should discuss a few things. A dmz of Silesia and Prussia would benefit us both. Let me know what you think. Also, there are plenty of joint risks to us both, particularly as the game progresses. Let me know if you've got any interest working together'.

messages.message: Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me
messages.input: My response to RUSSIA:'Hm I'm getting your messages only in email form. Not to worry. Yes, I did say Prussia in my original message. I think the Baltic sea sounds fair enough as well. Why don't we work together toward those ends? I'm not shocked at the idea Britain might be looking to come for me'.

messages.message:
Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia
messages.input:
Message from RUSSIA:'Hi germany! Are you up for Sil as a DMZ? It would be in both of our best interests if we didn't get in a fight early on, as both of our great powers already have a lot to deal with on our sides of the map. Looking forwards to a great game!

-Russia'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F KIE - DEN, A MUN - RUH, A BER - KIE. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. The previous messages from Russia have consistently mentioned establishing a demilitarized zone in Silesia, which aligns with their current proposal, indicating a sincere and consistent approach to cooperation.

messages.message: A DMZ of Prussia and the Baltic might also not hurt. And if you're up to it, maybe even a potential alliance against England?
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'A DMZ of Prussia and the Baltic might also not hurt. And if you're up to it, maybe even a potential alliance against England?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F KIE - DEN, A MUN - RUH, A BER - KIE. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. While Russia initially proposed a demilitarized zone in Silesia, their additional request for a DMZ in Prussia and the Baltic, along with suggesting an alliance against England, indicates a shift in their priorities and a potential willingness to pivot from their previous agreements for their own benefit.
